name: The Legend of Zelda
synopsis: Original Release Date: August 1987 Experience the original smash-hit adventure on the NES™! Ganon, the King of Evil, has broken free of the Dark World and has captured Hyrule's beloved Princess Zelda. But, before she was caught, Zelda™ managed to shatter the Triforce of Wisdom and scatter its eight pieces throughout Hyrule. You begin your adventure by finding a small wooden sword in a dark cave. Then, as you grow in stature, experience, and strength, so do your weapons. Help Link™ collect the captured pieces of the Triforce, rescue the princess, and thwart Ganon’s evil plans!
